title: S&P Lifts Paraguay Rating to Investment Grade, Joins Moody’s
description: S&P Global Ratings lifted Paraguay’s credit score, granting the South American nation its second investment-grade rating.
content: S&P Global Ratings lifted Paraguay’s credit score, granting the South American nation its second investment-grade rating.
